website_summaries.verdict: Effective, affordable, and extremely easy to use – hands down the best LED grow light for beginners to seasoned growers who want a great deal.
pros: A compact light that's easy to maneuver and hang that boasts full-spectrum light that plants thrive on, from sprout to bloom stages
cons: Not ideal for large growing spaces or lots of plants
Lacks the power of costlier models, but it still has a lot to offer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon mafia
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I will try this again. My last review was about how well this help my skin! I had before and after picture, but apparently it offended someone. Probably the FDA because this light helped me. But the review keeps violating someone’s policy.....
customer_reviews.author: Jason Spann

customer_reviews.title: Great for your 12 hour flowering
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely helped with flower and bud growth on our indoor herbs. 12 hours of this daily has encouraged much larger and stickier bud growth. We noticed a difference within days of starting to use it vs just regular LED lights. The only issue we have is that the light is so bright or on a wavelength that hurts human eyes, but our plants seem to love it. It's for them and not us. I'd recommend putting it where you don't have to look at it much or often. And just turn it off when you want to inspect and admire your flowers. We are using it in an inexpensive aluminum clip on lamp housing and it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 660nm light
customer_reviews.text: We use this for red light therapy (RLT). It's brighter than dedicated RLT lights and MUCH cheaper. So you don't need as many doses.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this light for my small flowers and so far it has been doing a pretty good job. My flowers was lacking full day sunlight and the weather has been much colder due to where I live and my flowers wasn't looking to healthy. I decided to put this grow light on them for about 10 hours a day since I received it and they have become healthier looking and filling out a lot better with more vibrant colors in the leaves. The light is very bright red, which I find is great for blooming flowers.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Actually works?
customer_reviews.text: Much to my surprise this red light therapy actually seems to be working... bought a gooseneck lamp to put the bulb in, have been using about two weeks and am actually noticing a difference. Much better value than the units for several hundred dollars and still seems to work though to be fair I haven't tried the expensive units. Bulb is a bit heavy though and tends to force the gooseneck lamp down slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1111

customer_reviews.title: Used light for laser light therapy
customer_reviews.text: This light was what I needed and expected. The size needs a larger housing with a secure base as it has some weight, but a very idea solution for my needs. It does not get hot in the housing and comfortable enough to hold the fixture to apply to different areas for treatment. The package arrived quickly and undamaged. I recommend the light.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, bright and fairly light. Appears to be correct wavelength for light therapy and penetrates muscle pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer guy

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m really excited about my spinach plant if you can’t tell. This is my first time using a grow light so I can’t honestly compare it to other lights on the market. I can say that my plant grew inside when it was too cold outside! I’m hopeful that the light will allow for some tropical plants to grow, but I haven’t got there yet. This bulb fit right into my lamp which was convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Cool light, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed, I have an 6X8 grow tent and have more plants than my main LED lights can support. I have one plant that is at the very end of the tent that was not getting enough light that is in the flower stage. I hung this 36 watt red LED bulb over it to supplement it’s light. That was about a week ago and I have seen a big improvement and it’s making a come back. Seems to be very well built so it looks like it will be around for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Normanknight

customer_reviews.title: Pulls less than 13W from the wall
customer_reviews.text: 35W? no... 20W average draw? No. According to my AC ammeter, this pulls just over 12W from the wall. Other lights are right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: red lights for tomato production
customer_reviews.text: Our garden is in its early days but we are trying a new technique to increase flower production with the red light. Some scientists say that the red affects the plant by using the red light also its possible to use a red mulch or plastic under the tomato plants as they grow. I can't say for certain that it will increase our volume but we are hoping.
customer_reviews.author: rkjt

customer_reviews.title: Good light and it works as described
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to have recived this light. This is the first LED light that I have gotten that is actually red. The other LED flashlights and book readers I have used claim to use a red light but when compared to this 660 nm light they look orange. This thing lights up my entire room which is 13 by 11 feet
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great light to throw into the mix.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the amount of light it puts out. It fills my 8x8 tent with a nice and strong red light. The plants love it. Added it in with my hps light. Think I can already tell a small difference.
customer_reviews.author: MoCityOwen

customer_reviews.title: Plumeria now has a 12 month growing season!
customer_reviews.text: Our plumeria grows outdoors in the summer but needs to come indoors before the first freeze of late fall. Once inside, the tree looses 95% of its leaves by December despite watering, feeding and a sunny room. After putting it outside in late spring it eventually rejuvenates to its vibrant, green self and begins flowering by the following September. This year I ordered the grow lights. We lugged our 30-year old baby into the house well before the first frost, set up the pair of lights, and four weeks into its new home it still has its full complement of leaves and is flowering beautifully. More green, more enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: Amzon+

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It is easy to install and practical to use. My husband has muscle pain, so I purchase this to my husband for reducing him muscle pain. After him use it a few days, he feels the muscle pain reduce a lot. This red LED light very nice and useful! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Jerome

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: won't stay in place, mounting arm fell off hit tomato plants on the way down. dead tomato plants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the study that said 670nm wavelength light helps improve eyesight. I'll see what it does after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: rlvlk

customer_reviews.title: Great light, good quality and affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. It’s well constructed does not emit any sound during operation, minimal heat emission and very well packaged. Good quality lights. I use it as an additional light to my flower tent. It’s operating with the main light to achieve Emerson Effect. It’s simply awesome. The results are impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Great light for plant growth.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lamp to help my clones take root and start to veg. Seems to respond very well so far. Will test and report back on how it helps flowering too! Beautiful color but I use sun glasses if working around grow lights close. The Deep Red is the bulb I am using.
customer_reviews.author: Bev & Rob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and it's truly a 'deep red'. Doesn't get hot (it's led).
customer_reviews.author: peony

customer_reviews.title: Photobiomodulation
customer_reviews.text: I had been reading about photobiomodulation. Decided to give red 660nm a try for my stiff back, early stage arthritis achy finger joints, knee and feet. Fixed on Ikea table light fixtures, placed 2 lamps about 3cm for about 30mins on my back and feet. Felt tingling sensation. Within 3 days, pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: IJ

customer_reviews.title: So far very good.
customer_reviews.text: This light is powerful and I use it on a goose neck desk light to direct at my face improve my skin. (Eye protection needed. This bulb is all business) Bulb is heavy, as expected
customer_reviews.author: Dream Fiercely. Dream Fearlessly.

customer_reviews.title: and my plants love it.
customer_reviews.text: A very pleasing red light for the eye, and my plants love it.
customer_reviews.author: Review349085

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look at the dimensions of this light. Really big! Going to update after using it for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Christiaan Muñoz-Salas

customer_reviews.title: my favorite light
customer_reviews.text: it's been 3 months since this went in the ceiling fan socket as my main bedroom lighting at night. The wavelength is very easy on the eyes, reading and writing no trouble. My skin and joint health has improved in these months (recovering from lyme disease) thanks in part to this investment:)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hauer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd purchase - Makes a difference during bloom
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 1 to try it out... came back to purchase 2 more. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for light therapy on my face and this works great. Nice results.
customer_reviews.author: Brookyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. I use them to grow seeds and grace my bonsai trees. They are versatile. You can set a different amount of time, or change the light mode to adapt to the growth or maintenance of plants
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nache

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light. Used to add supplemental light to my grow tent during flowering.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: It should say...The customer who bought this product also bought bandaid because you're gonna need it!
customer_reviews.author: Wupac 808

customer_reviews.title: Great plant light
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this light to supplement the winter window light for our succulents and a few other plants. It works well and has a decent range. Some of higher light succulents are still stretching a little, but it's great for jade plants! I have had it on almost continuously for around month without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped promptly and arrived in great packaging. I have muscle pain in my legs, so I decide to purchase this. I have used a couple weeks, this totally solve my muscle pain problem. Now it is my life partner! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aairah Little

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this led light again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for starting my vegetables for the outdoor garden.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This light is junk wouldn't even light up a 2x5 grow tent it's worthless don't buy
customer_reviews.author: odis warren

customer_reviews.title: Using for healing light
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this light for light therapy for my skin. I haven't had any issues with the light, it does not get hot for the amount of time I use it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jarad

customer_reviews.title: My evening light
customer_reviews.text: These turn on at sunset in my computer room. I love how well it bathes the room red
customer_reviews.author: A. Paek

customer_reviews.title: Makes your coral grow
customer_reviews.text: Works just like its supposed to. My algae love it
customer_reviews.author: Harleyfirecapt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Light is so dim it barely lights up anything that is within 12 inches of the bulb. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. I guess we'll see how long she works.
customer_reviews.author: will bratton

customer_reviews.title: Good light, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great light, it is heavier than you think. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Linden

customer_reviews.title: I bought something American made that is $5 more but much better quality. I'm returning this and reordering the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of junk from China. Rattled right out of the box. I plugged it in, the light worked but not the fan. I bought something American made that is $5 more but much better quality. I'm returning this and reordering the one from ABi, they also have a 3-year warranty. There has to be a cooling system for hi-powered LEDs because they current must be changed from AC to DC.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Amote

customer_reviews.title: Danger:  Beware of this red light
customer_reviews.text: The red light blew out with hot sparks flying throughout my bedroom. After it stopped sparkling it left my house in complete darkness. It shut the electricity off and I had to reset the circuit breaker. Could have set house on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for light therapy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the spectral output, cost, wattage and reviews. Apparently the only negative reviews are user's running this lamp for hours. Studies have shown that a max 10 minute exposure is optimal and this lamp does not even get warm in that amount of time. Also, the deep heating effect is pleasant, so it is working. I won't go into details about what therapy I am using it for, but I will say it is just great for androgenic enhancement.
customer_reviews.author: EE Professor

customer_reviews.title: There's bright red light and then there's this red LED light!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that this red LED light was this incredibly bright! Be careful not to look directly into it; it takes some time for the spots to go away. The entire light assembly is very well built, fairly lightweight and only gets mildly warm when I use it. I bought this for light therapy and I think it's more than enough for the task at hand!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip from SLC

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to use, great for testing 670nm led light on repairing eyes
customer_reviews.text: I got this to test the recent science study about 670nm LED lights rejuvenating older eyes. It works great for that and is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Markham T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little light!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing. I have used them to start seeds, give my bonsai trees light, They are versatile. You can set different amounts of time, or change the light modes to accommodate either growth or maintenance of plants. I recommend these to anyone with gardening needs
customer_reviews.author: Gifford

product_meta.title: HIGROW 36W All Deep Red 660nm LED Grow Light Bulb for Indoor Plants Flowering Bloom and Fruiting, Grow Spectrum Enhancement
product_meta.description:
Color:36w Deep Red 660nmWelcome to HIGROW LED store, we are always dedicated to providing good quality products and service, any problems of lights, please feel free to contact with us, we will service you till satisfaction. 

Product Feature:
High power design, with 18pcs 2W super bright LEDs, more higher power/lumen/PAR value than other led grow bulb.
Easy to Used: Designed to fit standard E26/E27 socket, 100~240V AC, Easy to set up and use. suitable for mini grow tent and greenhouse. It is time to add a small sun for your plants!

Specifications:
Dimensions: 4.7x4.7x4.5 inches
Item Weight: 1.2 lbs
Core Coverage at 24" Height 1x1ft
Max Coverage at 24" Height 1.5x1.5ft
Max. Power Draw: 36 Watt
Avg. Power Draw: 20 watt
LED Quantities: 18pcs 2 watt Bridgelux/Epileds
LED Lens: 120 degree
Input Voltage: AC100-240V
Frequency: 50-60Hz
Lifespan: 50,000 hours

Package includes:
1 x 36 watt LED Grow Bulb

Attention please:
Indoor use only, not water-proof. 
Extremely bright, do not look directly at the LED bulbs when the light is working.
feature_bullets: New High Efficient Red LED Bulb: Design with 18pcs 2 watt super bright deep red 660nm LEDs, 120 degree optical lens, higher PAR / Lumen out put per watt than other red LED bulb, maximize Growth.

Advanced Deep Red Spectrum: The 660nm deep red spectrum is the main and key spectrum of plant growth, especially the flowering and fruiting stage, which enhances plant photosynthesis, prolongs flowering, increases fruit yield, better taste.
Better Heat Dissipation: Build with new upgraded 0603 aluminum cooling heat sink, keep good temperature even after 24 hours of continuous use, longer lifespan and more energy less heat.
Easy to Use: Designed to fit standard E26/E27 socket, 100~240V AC, Easy to set up and use. suitable for mini grow tent and greenhouse. It is time to add a small sun for your plants!
Worry-Free Warranty: 12 months warranty plus 30 days satisfaction or return guarantee, 100% money back.
